src:
Ny McDonald's chef lämnar efter vd-kicken
Inte ens ett dygn efter att McDonald's sparkat sin vd Steve Easterbrook lämnar också den högt uppsatta chefen David Fairhurst sin post med omedelbar verkan. Det rapporterar CNBC.
04 Nov 2019, 17:58 by Victor Hultgren

text:
New McDonald's boss leaves after the CEO kick off
Not even a day after McDonald's kicked off his CEO Steve Easterbrook, high-ranking manager David Fairhurst also leaves his post with immediate effect. It reports CNBC.
04 Nov 2019, 17:58 by Victor Hultgren
